thread.title: Mike Gobster
thread.title_full: Specialized Products Company reviewed by Mike Gobster

author: Mike Gobster
title: Mike Gobster
text: The super deluxe mini ratchet set has to be one of the best tools for general work I've ever seen. It's small, but works great. The set is expensive, but it's worth a little extra money to know I'll have this for the next 20 years.
